posts.shortdesc: Welcome to the offical distrodrone blog!
posts.title: Hello World!
posts.content:
Hello and welcome to the DistroDrone blog! This blog is pretty new but expect content to be appearing at least once a week on Fridays. We pride ourselves on staying up to date on the newest drone technology and projects. Here we will help you learn about the ins and outs of drone tech.
 Stay tuned for next weeks post. It will be looking at the process of selecting your first drone.
posts.author: Thomas Shaw
